塝字的基本解释

塝
bàng
方言，田地、沟渠、土埂的边坡（多用于地名）：田塝；张家塝（均在中国湖北省）。

塝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bàng］
［《集韻》蒲浪切，去宕，並。］
(1)方言。田边；沟渠或土埂的边。
(2)山边地势较高的田地。参见“塝田”。
(3)犹片，块。

塝字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塝； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页236第07
【集韻】蒲浪切，音傍。地畔也。吳楚閒方語。土之平阜曰塝，溝塍之畦畔處亦曰塝。

塝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
塝字的起名意思

暂无。

塝
Basic explanation of words
塝
bàng
Dialect, slopes of fields, ditches, and ridges (mostly used for place names): Tiandi; Zhangjiadi (both in Hubei Province, China).
塝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bàng］
["Ji Yun" Pu Lang cuts, goes down, and merges. ]
(1) Dialects. The edge of the field; the edge of a ditch or ridge.
(2) Fields with higher terrain on the edge of the mountain. See "塝田".
(3) Still slices, blocks.
塝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　塝; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 236 Page 07
[Ji Yun] Pu Lang cut, sound close. The ground also. Wu Chu idle talk. The flat fu of the soil is called 塝, and the border of the ditch is also called 塝.
塝
